triples.name: Modal logic
triples.relevance: Modal logic is the foundational framework that the paper extends with dependence concepts.

triples.name: Game theory
triples.relevance: Game-theoretic semantics provide one of the two definitions used to formalize the new modal dependence logic.

triples.name: Dependence logic
triples.relevance: The paper introduces modal dependence logic, a novel combination of modal logic with dependence concepts.
